thread.title: There’s Such A Thing As A Disney River Cruise And I Went On It
thread.title_full: There’s Such A Thing As A Disney River Cruise And I Went On It

author: SunnyChanel
title: There’s Such A Thing As A Disney River Cruise And I Went On It
text:
View this image ›
disneyland.disney.go.com Or, if you’re feeling REALLY ambitious, Aulani in Hawaii.
ID: 10324081 But did you know there’s such a thing as a Disney river cruise? View this image ›
NBC I know, right?
ID: 10324108 1. My daughter and I are huge, HUGE Disney fans, so we were very excited to pack our bags and set out on the European extravaganza down the Danube with Adventures by Disney . View this image ›
ID: 10324144 2. This was our home for the week: The Amaviola cruise ship. View this image ›
AmaWaterways / Via amawaterways.com Not bad, huh? It took us through four countries: Germany, Austria, Slovakia, and Hungary.
ID: 10243715 3. The Amaviola is a swanky way to see Europe with a few Disney touches, but there’s one thing you should know… View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed ID: 10234679 4. You won’t be seeing this guy. View this image ›
giphy.com There are no character breakfasts, mouse meet and greets or autograph sessions. You could say he’s there is spirit but not, uh, in person.
ID: 10240900 5. He did show up at the welcome lunch. We ate him. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed ID: 10234706 6. He also appeared with Minnie on the charmingly off-brand welcome cake. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
ID: 10234437 7. The rooms on the ship are itsy bitsy, but comfy. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed The size doesn’t really matter since we didn’t hang out there except to sleep.
ID: 10234697 8. Each morning you’re given an itinerary with the day’s events. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed Oh, hi Cogsworth.
ID: 10234688 9. Our first event was in Germany for pretzels and pilsners. Score! View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed ID: 10234694 10. There was traditional dancing by these gentlemen in shorts. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed ID: 10244379 11. And we got acquainted with our Disney Adventure Guides, many of whom came straight from Disneyland or Disney World. View this image ›
Adventures By Disney Note the classic Disney cast member pin and princess-like aura.
ID: 10340978 12. Bavaria was a REALLY beautiful place to visit. We loved exploring picturesque towns this one like Passau. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed ID: 10234687 13. We also went on tours with costumed locals, so we learned stuff too. Bonus! View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed ID: 10341053 14. We visited really pretty locales like historic abbeys and palaces. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed ID: 10240664 15. Then there were masterpieces like this: a waffle covered in vanilla custard, whipped cream and caramel. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed Nom, nom and nom.
ID: 10240324 16. We later stumbled across this shop that sold pretzels in a crazy array of flavors and colors. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed Check out the baby blue and pastel pink pretzels. Cray!
ID: 10234683 17. We also got to see parts of where The Sound of Music were shot. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/ BuzzFeed JULIE ANDREWS WAS ONCE in that EXACT SPOT! Yes, that.
ID: 10341192 18. We might’ve enjoyed seeing these rare blue-eyed donkeys in the Austrian countryside even more. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed ID: 10240669 19. In Vienna, Austria we got to see an old school marionette performance, which thrilled the kids (and kids at heart) in the crew. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed ID: 10240666 20. Part of the fun of the cruise was getting plenty of free time to explore, shop and chill in the towns you visit like Bratislava. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed ID: 10240667 21. Budapest was spectacular too — especially at night. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed ID: 10234668 22. Of course, we spent a lot of time on the boat where there were buffets at breakfast and lunch, and dinner made with ingredients from the port we last visited as well as dishes inspired by the destinations. Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed
 ID: 10340446 23. There was nightly entertainment, too, like these Austrian singers who belted out opera and ditties from the Sound of Music . View this image ›
Sunny Chanel/BuzzFeed And yeah, it totally looks like she’s Disneybounding as Cinderella. We approve.
ID: 10234685 24. At the end we ended up with this souvenir: a lanyard covered with pins from each place you visited starring luminaries like Minnie, Mickey, Donald, and Daisy. View this image ›
Sunny Chanel ID: 10244483 Thanks for the ride, Mickey! View this image ›
Disney ID: 10346662
